comment._content: Carlos Manuel de Céspedes y Quesada (August 12 1871, New York City, New York, United States – March 28 1939, Vedado, Havana, Cuba) was a Cuban writer, politician, diplomat, and President of Cuba. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Manuel_de_Céspedes_y_Quesada

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: and in  1914, he was Cuban Ambassador to the United States.
